title: Hit points
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

A character's **hit points** (or **HP**) reflect their current healthiness and durability, and are displayed in an X/Y format; the X shows your current hit points, while the Y shows your maximum. [Monsters](/Monster "Monster") and a wide variety of other effects will all reduce your current HP, but this [recovers over time](/Regeneration_rate "Regeneration rate") unless you are [sick](/Sick "Sick").

## Contents

- [1 Damage](#Damage)

- [2 Regeneration](#Regeneration)

- [3 HP modifiers](#HP_modifiers)

- [4 Modifying Max HP](#Modifying_Max_HP)

  - [4.1 Forms](#Forms)
  - [4.2 Statuses](#Statuses)
  - [4.3 Mutations](#Mutations)
  - [4.4 Items](#Items)
  - [4.5 Permanent](#Permanent)

- [5 History](#History)

## Damage

If at any time your character's current HP reaches 0 or lower, you [die](/Death "Death") and your game is over. You can avoid this by resting between battles, quaffing [potions of heal wounds](/Potions_of_heal_wounds "Potions of heal wounds") or [curing](/Potion_of_curing "Potion of curing"), or using any of the more exotic [healing](/Healing "Healing") methods available.

Be very careful if you ever see the message, "Ouch! That really hurt!" pop up - it occurs after you've lost over 50% of your max HP in a single attack.

## Regeneration

*Main Article: [regeneration rate](/Regeneration_rate "Regeneration rate")*

Characters which are not [sick](/Sick "Sick") or under [Inhibited Regeneration](/Inhibited_Regeneration "Inhibited Regeneration") will naturally recover health over time.

## HP modifiers

From [Dungeon Crawl](/Dungeon_Crawl "Dungeon Crawl") [Stone Soup](/Stone_Soup "Stone Soup") in-game documentation:

|                                |                              |                            |                                |                              |                                    |                            |                                  |                          |                                |                                |                          |                          |                          |                            |                              |                                |                                            |                          |                        |                                |                      |                                |                          |                          |                              |                                        |
| ------------------------------ | ---------------------------- | -------------------------- | ------------------------------ | ---------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | -------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ------------------------ | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------ | ------------------------ | ------------------------ | ------------------------ | -------------------------- | ---------------------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------ | ------------------------ | ---------------------- | ------------------------------ | -------------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------ | ------------------------ | ---------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| **[At](/Armataur "Armataur")** | **[Ba](/Barachi "Barachi")** | **[Co](/Coglin "Coglin")** | **[DE](/Deep_Elf "Deep Elf")** | **[Dg](/Demigod "Demigod")** | **[Ds](/Demonspawn "Demonspawn")** | **[Dj](/Djinni "Djinni")** | **[Dr](/Draconian "Draconian")** | **[Fe](/Felid "Felid")** | **[Fo](/Formicid "Formicid")** | **[Gr](/Gargoyle "Gargoyle")** | **[Gh](/Ghoul "Ghoul")** | **[Gn](/Gnoll "Gnoll")** | **[Hu](/Human "Human")** | **[Ko](/Kobold "Kobold")** | **[Mf](/Merfolk "Merfolk")** | **[Mi](/Minotaur "Minotaur")** | **[MD](/Mountain_Dwarf "Mountain Dwarf")** | **[Mu](/Mummy "Mummy")** | **[Na](/Naga "Naga")** | **[Op](/Octopode "Octopode")** | **[On](/Oni "Oni")** | **[Sp](/Spriggan "Spriggan")** | **[Te](/Tengu "Tengu")** | **[Tr](/Troll "Troll")** | **[Vp](/Vampire "Vampire")** | **[VS](/Vine_Stalker "Vine Stalker")** |
| 1                              | 0                            | 0                          | -2                             | 1                            | 0                                  | -1                         | 1                                | -3                       | 0                              | -2                             | 1                        | 0                        | 0                        | -2                         | 0                            | 1                              | 1                                          | 0                        | 2                      | -1                             | 3                    | -3                             | -2                       | 3                        | 0                            | -3                                     |

Each point is equal to 10% maximum HP.

## Modifying Max HP

### Forms

The following forms will change your maximum HP:

| Spell                                        | Modifier |
| -------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| [Serpent Form](/Serpent_Form "Serpent Form") | 1.2      |
| [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form")    | 1.3      |
| [Dragon Form](/Dragon_Form "Dragon Form")    | 1.5      |
| [Tree Form](/Tree_Form "Tree Form")          | 1.5      |

If are in a [talisman](/Talisman "Talisman") form and do not have the minimum Shapeshifting skill, you get an HP penalty. The penalty is `1 - (Skill_min - Skill_current)/10` (min. x0.1).

### Statuses

- [Berserk](/Berserk "Berserk") will multiply your current and maximum HP by 1.5. [Bearserk](/Hat_of_the_Bear_Spirit "Hat of the Bear Spirit") multiplies it by 2.
- [Drain](/Drain "Drain") will reduce max HP proportionally to its strength.
- [Elyvilon](/Elyvilon "Elyvilon")'s Divine Vigor increases your max HP temporarily by your Invocations.

### Mutations

- Gaining the [Robust](/Robust "Robust") [mutation](/Mutation "Mutation") increases your max HP by 10% per rank, while [Frail](/Frail "Frail") decreases it.
- Gaining the [Rugged Brown Scales](/Rugged_Brown_Scales "Rugged Brown Scales") mutation increases your max HP by 3/5/7% (determined by rank).

### Items

- The [Rings of the Octopus King](/Rings_of_the_Octopus_King "Rings of the Octopus King") give you +2 HP.

### Permanent

Your permanent max HP only changes under rare circumstance:

- Leveling up:

  - Gaining an [experience](/Experience "Experience") level.
  - Improving your [Fighting](/Fighting "Fighting") skill will increase max HP.

- Casting [Borgnjor's Revivification](/Borgnjor%27s_Revivification "Borgnjor's Revivification") permanently reduces your max HP by a small amount, determined by spell power.

- Running out of time on the [Zot clock](/Zot_clock "Zot clock") permanently reduces your max HP by 16.6%.

The formula is:

```
 Max HP = (Racial Mod.) * (Mutations Mod.) * (Forms Mod.)
        * (8 + 11*XL/2 + Fighting*XL/14 + (1+Fighting*3)/2)
```

## History

- In [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), the Zot clock would only apply drain instead of permanent HP reduction. Prior to this, the Zot clock instantly killed you upon running out.
- Prior to [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), [rot](/Rot "Rot") existed, lowering maximum HP temporarily, like [Drain](/Drain "Drain") does now. However, it could be cured with a [potion of heal wounds](/Potion_of_heal_wounds "Potion of heal wounds") or [potion of curing](/Potion_of_curing "Potion of curing").
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), backgrounds had a small effect in the calculation of the player's hit points.
